bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with bao yi bu xia 胞衣不下. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry zao jia 皂莢：除咳 嗽，囊結，婦人胞不落 , “It removes cough, pouch nodes, and [helps] women when the placenta fails to descend ”. Bao chi mu 暴赤目 , severely red eye [3]

Pathological Condition identical with bao chi yan 暴赤眼 . Ben cao yan yi 本草衍義 Substance Entry gu wen qian 古文錢：少時 常自患暴赤目，腫痛，數日不能開 , “In my youth I often suffered from severely red eyes , with swelling and pain. I could not open them for several days”.
